changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_cooldown') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_cooldown GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.remove_cooldown @character_id dbo.id_t, @data_code dbo.code_t
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM dbo.Cooldown_Infos WHERE character_id = @character_id AND data_code = @data_code
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_cooldown') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_cooldown GO
